title: Zelenskyy accuses Russia of genocide; missiles slam into port city of Odesa. Follow our live updates
content:
1. Zelenskyy accuses Russia of genocide; missiles slam into port city of Odesa. Follow our live updates  CNBC
  2. Zelenskyy reacts to devastating images coming out of Ukraine: 'This is genocide'  Fox News
  3. Zelenskyy accuses Russia of genocide for alleged atrocities in Ukraine  Face the Nation
  4. Blinken, Stoltenberg hold back on labeling Russia's actions 'genocide'  POLITICO
  5. Russia-Ukraine live news: Zelenskyy accuses Russia of ‘genocide’  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
